title: plat to gold
body: If i am in plat and drop to gold before the end of the season, will i get a plat boarder or a gold boarder?

replies.body:
The rewards are for whatever rank you end the season with, so my advice is to not drop down to Gold.  D:

I highly recommend checking out our [Ranked Rewards Announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) for complete details on the end of season. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Gold. "Ranked rewards based on your end of season ranking, not peak ranking." http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon
